alert.note: Alert for Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 03 at 3:14PM CST until January 03 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CST FOR EAST CENTRAL TALLAPOOSA AND CHAMBERS COUNTIES... At 314 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Trammel Crossroads to West Chambers to near Waverly, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Valley, Lanett, Camp Hill, Lafayette, Stroud, La Fayette, Waverly, Lakeview, Five Points, Cusseta, Post Oak Forks, Denson, Amity Park, Sturkie, Standing Rock, Trammel Crossroads, Ridge Grove, Buffalo, Chambers County Lake and Fredonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
